cast.original_title: Shoot Shoot! Di Ko Siya Titigilan!
cast.overview: When an aspiring actor practices his role as a billionaire out loud, a gossip about him being rich spreads like wildfire. Now, the girls and the goons are after him.
cast.title: Shoot Shoot! Di Ko Siya Titigilan!

cast.overview: When curly camgirl Elle meets an architect, Peter, she believes she's ready to love again. How long can she keep her job secret from him?
cast.title: Crush Kong Curly

cast.overview: After she was accused of being a negligent mother, Sabel’s wedding to Prince Harry was cancelled. To make things right, she embarks on a journey to find her estranged sons and reunite her family.
cast.title: S.O.N.S. (Sons Of Nanay Sabel)

cast.overview: This song-and-dance musical follows the journey of an island girl with a natural gift for dancing as she navigates through life in the city to follow her dreams and find love along the way.
cast.title: Indak

cast.overview: Ex-gang members and newlyweds Al and Liezl run away with a big bag of cash, but their ex-boss will go to the ends of the earth to find them.
cast.title: Hugas

cast.overview: Young lovers chase their big city dreams but get tested by lust, addiction, and the hunger for money. Will their love survive, or will reaching for their dreams tear them apart?
cast.title: Sugapa

cast.overview: Boogie almost kills the man his girlfriend, Monica, hooked up with. His cop uncle helps him hide, but unknown to them his victim's family is putting justice into their own hands.
cast.title: Kaliwaan

cast.overview: A story about a gangster couple who returns to Sitio Diablo, a gangland in Manila, and form a new gang, Illustrados. A bloodbath is set to happen when they face their old gang, Los Hijos Diablos who rules Sitio Diablo.
cast.title: Sitio Diablo

cast.overview: A documentary on the rise and fall and recent return of sexy movies in Philippine cinema. Featuring interviews from the sexy movie icons of the past and the rising sexy stars of the present.
cast.title: Seksi: Pantasya at Pelikula

cast.overview: A young couple's shaky marriage becomes more chaotic when another woman comes into the picture. But what happens when the two women fall in love with each other?
cast.title: Us X Her

cast.overview: An action and advocacy film tribute to all security guards in the Philippines.
cast.title: Security Academy

cast.original_title: Paglaki Ko, Gusto Kong Maging Pornstar
cast.overview: A group of former pornstars gathered to teach aspiring teen actress to be a porn star and will receive cash each if the actress will be launched.
cast.title: Paglaki Ko, Gusto Kong Maging Pornstar

cast.overview: When Christine was found brutally killed in the woods, her boyfriend, a forest ranger and a farmer are summoned for inquest. Each has a version to tell. But as the case deepens, they discover the shocking truth.
cast.title: Death of a Girlfriend

cast.overview: Misfortune starts to happen on an island when a beautiful maiden is washed ashore. She falls in love with a local fisherman who eventually disappears after a sea accident. She commits to do and to give everything, even her body, in order to find him.
cast.title: Nerisa

cast.overview: Sixto explores the dangerous world of online ending for his thesis and gets involved with Winona, Nieves and Nanette.
cast.title: Taya

cast.overview: Get ready to AROUSE your senses! Hosted by Aiko Garcia and Jenn Rosa, this steamy special brings you the hottest, most unforgettable scenes from VMX’s A-list sirens—AJ Raval, Ayanna Misola, Azi Acosta & more. Desire, passion, and pure heat—are you ready?
cast.title: Arouse

cast.overview: VMX crush Dyessa Garcia takes fans through the sizzling hot journey of one of VMX’s original A-listers – AJ Raval going all out in her most unforgettable and daring scenes.
cast.title: All Out: AJ Raval
